attributes.action: Look after our war heroes before asylum seekers and the unemployed!
attributes.additional_details:
From the Daily Mail: "While £1m homes go to asylum seekers, a soldier who lost three limbs serving his country is put in a tiny flat ... on the SIXTH floor!"

How can this be allowed to happen?

rejection.details: See e-petition titled "Injured UK soldiers returning from war to be given priority over asylum seekers and non-British nationals for housing and financial assistance"
